content: this pattern is for a heart keychain materials medium weight #4 cotton yarn crochet hook e/4 3 5 mm key ring with chain jump ring flat-nose pliers small charm finished size heart is about 1 5″ 3 8 cm skill level easy language english the pattern uses crochet us terms ________________________________________________ free version of this pattern is available on my website https //www goldenlucycrafts com/crochet-heart-keychain-pattern/ by purchasing this listing you will receive the pattern in a print-friendly and styled pdf format _______________________________________________ product safety this is a virus free pdf it contains embedded links to reputable websites all links are to trusted sources but discretion is always advised when using links to external websites gpsr representative ciara doyle 6 killallon close c15 y5f9 ireland email ciara@thefairythorn ie
